// Portfolio/project/rootApp.js import React from "react"; import { Helmet, HelmetProvider } from "react-helmet-async"; import { Container } from "react-bootstrap"; import "../style.css"; import "./project.css"; // Project-specific CSS // Import image assets import intendedUserImg from "./img/root/intendeduser.jpg"; import intendedUserMobileImg from "./img/root/rootMobile/intendeduser_mobile.jpg"; import personaDetailImg from "./img/root/personadetail.png"; import sketches1Img from "./img/root/sketches1.jpg"; import sketches1MobileImg from "./img/root/rootMobile/sketches1_mobile.jpg"; // Add more images as needed const RootProject = () => { return ( Root Project | Portfolio {/* Project Header Section */}

Root

ROOT is a family communication social application that helps users stay connected and share updates with their families abroad. It is designed with accessibility in mind, especially for senior users.

Tools Used: Figma, Protopie
Team Mijili | SFU | IAT339

View Prototype View Promo Video
{/* Explanation Section */}

Idea & Interaction Framework

Based on our interviews and research, our primary users are seniors over 75 years old with family members living abroad. This app aims to keep families connected and allows seniors to feel a sense of connection with their loved ones, regardless of physical or geographical barriers.

Persona

Persona 01: Judy

Judy is a 75-year-old single woman with a daughter living in Japan and a son in Seattle. Due to the pandemic, she has been feeling isolated and wants to stay connected with her family but finds using technology challenging.

Sketches

Our initial design sketches include main features such as the homepage, profile, and album sections. Each profile displays the family memberâ€™s time zone and weather.
